titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Royal Palm Artifacts and Ephemera Collection19th-20th century
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by MA, 2010

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Royal Palm Artifacts and Ephemera. Collection

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: This collection contains a variety of artifacts and print ephemera. Included are political items from the 20th century, University of Chicago and Hyde Park memorabilia, a small collection of recipes and information on home remedies, and patriotic memorabilia. The cigar box in which this material was found is also included.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Royal Palm Artifacts and Ephemera. Collection, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a variety of artifacts and print ephemera. Included are political material from the 20th century, University of Chicago and Hyde Park memorabilia, a small collection of recipes and information on home remedies, and patriotic items. The cigar box in which this material was found is also included.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:

did.unittitle: University of Chicago, ceremonial ribbons and centennial pin, 20th century
Hyde Park Hotel pencil and Hotel del Prado postcard, 19th-20th century
Political ephemera, Workers Party, Dewey-Bricker, Carol Moseley Braun, Franklin Delano Roosevelt, 20th century
Clippings, broadsides and correspondence regarding recipes and home remedies, ca. late 19th-early 20th century
F.X. Jungwirth, Ansicht von München vom Gasteigberg, reproduction of 1766 print, undated
Menu, bookmark and Valentine's Day cards, ca. 1930s-1960s
University of Chicago, James R. Watkins, signature printing block, 20th century
University of Chicago, public relations awards medals, 20th century
Political ephemera, Frank O. Lowden, ca. 1920s
